createdAt.description: The timestamp when the email was created.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the campaign associated with the email_send data.

documentCreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the document was last updated.

messageTypeId.description: The identifier of the message type associated with the email_send data.

transactionalData.description: Transactional data related to the email_send.

inventory.description: The quantity of the product in stock.

eventName.description: The name of the event associated with the transaction.

sku.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the product.

email.description: The email address associated with the transaction.

url.description: The URL related to the transaction or product.

description.description: Description of the product or transaction.

product_type.description: The type or category of the product.

compare_at_price.description: The original price of the product being transacted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the transactional data.

templateId.description: The identifier of the template used for the transactional data.

categories.description: Categories related to the transactional data.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the transactional data was created.

campaignId.description: The identifier of the campaign associated with the transactional data.

vendor.description: The vendor or seller of the product.

eventUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the event was last updated.

discount.description: The discount applied to the product.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the image related to the product.

itblInternal.description: Internal information related to ITBL (Iterable) for transactional data.

documentCreatedAt.description: The timestamp when the document related to transactional data was created.

documentUpdatedAt.description: The timestamp when the document related to transactional data was last updated.

handle.description: A unique identifier for the transaction or product.

contentId.description: The identifier of the content related to the email being sent.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

messageBusId.description: The identifier of the message bus associated with the email_send data.

templateId.description: The identifier of the template used for the email content.

email.description: The email address of the recipient.

userId.description: The identifier of the user to whom the email is being sent.

channelId.description: The identifier of the channel through which the email was sent.
